title: Awakened as a Fine Female Cannon Fodder - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Sci-fi   Shoujo   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Artificial Intelligence   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cute Protagonist   Early Romance   Family Business   Family Conflict   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Interdimensional Travel   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Older Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Proactive Protagonist   Showbiz   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: Lan Gui   兰桂
description:
In every book, there’s always a female cannon fodder who seeks death – the ones who are arrogant and tyrannical, spoiled and willful, and the ones who are abused till half-dead by the male protagonist. 

After Huo Wei transmigrated and became a female cannon fodder things were different than expected! 

Scum’s dad favored and fell in love with his daughter? Why don’t you just be a couple instead!

The Chairman became a dog who doesn’t care for personnel matters? I’ll send you to Tokow* to further broaden your knowledge!

The fake daughter is detested? See you! You can’t climb up the social ladders!

*Note: old name for Kaohsiung in Taiwan>
